title: Bayesian Networks
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Graphical model representing probabilistic relationships. 
Nodes = Variables (Cloudy, Rain, WetGrass). 
Links = Dependency (Cloudy -> Rain). 
Allows inference.

interview_questions.question: What is Markov Blanket?
interview_questions.answer: Node's parents, children, and children's parents. Everything needed to isolate a node.

real_world_use_cases.description: Symptoms point to diseases with probabilities.

exam_notes: Network structure simplifies join probability calculation.
